Re-ordering Columns in the Report Definition

As you add columns to the report definition, they will be added in the order they are clicked, with metrics pushed to the right and attributes clustered on the left (explained in more detail in the metrics and attributes sections). This is the order in which columns will appear in the report as well. To change the order, you can click on the column header in the Report Definition (or the Report Grid) and drag to the desired location.
